network

Class NetworkNameGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.NetworkNameGenerator

  • public class NetworkNameGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    NetworkNameGenerator is responsible for giving unique names to networks and as such keeps track of all network names currently registered. It does not keep track of the networks.
    Since:
    0.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joeri Ruyssinck (joeri.ruysssinck@intec.ugent.be)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String getNextName()
      Request a new name for a network
      static void reset()
      Clears all registered names.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getNextName

        public static java.lang.String getNextName()
        Request a new name for a network

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Clears all registered names. Warning, if there are still networks in existence, network name are no longer guarenteed to be unique
